com.cmput301w19t12.bookbuddies

Class BookRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w19t12.bookbuddies.BookRequest

  • public class BookRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a book request event contains requesterID and username, the requested book and the request ID
    See Also:
    RequestViewActivity, RequestViewAdapter
